modal_activate_task_note:
Activate this task.
You will be able to display it on the calendar, edit tasks, create work results, etc.
To avoid trouble, please write the reason for activation in the "Description" column of the task details screen after activation.
button_add_process: さらに手順を追加する

modal_create_task_no_department_content:
Tasks for which no department is specified will not be displayed mainly on the following screens.
<circle/> This month's to-do list
<circle/> See tasks by deadline
<circle/> See tasks in business
Would you like to return to the task addition screen and specify the department?
modal_create_task_no_lead_time_content:
Tasks for which the scheduled work period is not specified will not be displayed in the "To do calendar".
Would you like to return to the task addition screen and specify the scheduled work period?
search_no_data:
検索結果は0件です。
条件を変えて検索してください。
modal_inactivate_task_note:
<title>Disable this task.</title>
<description>Select the reason for invalidation and click "Disable Task". </description>
<notes>* If disabled, it will not be displayed on the calendar.
* If disabled, work results cannot be recorded.
* If you disable it, you will not be able to edit it until it is enabled again.
</notes>
modal_cancel_update_task_message: Cancel the task update. Is it OK?
modal_update_task_no_department_content:
Tasks for which no department is specified will not be displayed mainly on the following screens.
・ This month's to-do list
・ See tasks by deadline
・ See tasks in business
Would you like to go back to editing and specify the department?
modal_clone_task_content: Duplicate the task. Is it OK?
modal_update_task_no_lead_time_content:
Tasks for which the scheduled work period is not specified will not be displayed in the "To do calendar".
Would you like to go back to edit and specify the work schedule?
search_for_disabled_tasks: Search for disabled tasks (reason for invalidation)
include_tasks_not_have_department: Include items that do not have a department in charge in the search
